channel.title: How to create basic Iptable rules
channel.description:
Hi, I need a software to manage Iptable rules, of course I can set manually but I'm not a big expert and of course there will be a significant probability to make mistakes . I would use a software and than manually control the code .
How do you do this setup on Firewall ? Only manually or by help software ?

item.title: How to create basic Iptable rules
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
Hiberts:

of course I can set manually but I’m not a big expert and of course there will be a significant probability to make mistakes .

from this i thought u r searching for something easy to handle. which where gufw&ufw solve it for u.

something harder/complex then use = iptables

Read full topic
item.source: How to create basic Iptable rules

item.title: How to create basic Iptable rules
item.dc:creator: Hiberts
item.description:
Thanks, I knew UFW but I though you used more complicated tools .
However, I’m writing the Iptables rules for my need ( VPN and others ), I’ll post here it, maybe among some month .

Read full topic
